oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge and copy print of Union Pvt. Shelton Craighead
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Craighead is being discharged in Nashville at war's end from 3 years' service in the 2nd Battalion of the Veterans Reserve Corps, formed mainly of men who, because of wounds, age or infirmity, were unfit for front line service. Craighead was born in Smith City [County?], Tennessee document provides physical description.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Craighead, Shelton
